# destinationMIDIEndpoint

**Instance Property**

The MIDI endpoint you specify as the track’s target.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationMIDIEndpoint: MIDIEndpointRef { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property and a [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicTrack/destinationAudioUnit] are mutually exclusive. Setting this property removes the track’s reference to an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnit] destination. When playing, the track sends events to the MIDI endpoint. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMIDI/MIDIDestinationCreate(_:_:_:_:_:)]. You can’t change the endpoint while the track’s sequence is in a playing state.

## Configuring the Track Destinations

- **destinationAudioUnit**: The audio unit that receives the track’s events.

items.description: The audio unit that receives the track’s events.
